name: Sundance Aviation
about: At Sundance Aviation, we offer comprehensive flight training tailored to fit your busy schedule. Our integrated training method puts you in control from day one, ensuring a hands-on introduction to flying. We encourage prospective pilots to take an introductory flight for $149, which includes a 30-minute flight with a certified instructor. To become a Private Pilot, you must be at least 17 years old and obtain a 3rd Class Medical/Student Pilot Certificate. Our training includes flexible scheduling, online reservation options, and the use of fully-restored Piper Cherokee 140 and 150 aircraft. We also provide Flight Reviews and Instrument Rating training. Our facilities include a 24-hour pilots lounge with amenities like Wi-Fi and a courtesy car. At Sundance Aviation, we are committed to making your flight training experience both effective and enjoyable.
